## Overview

NARC-1 is the first HF station on your left as you enter the station.

![NARC-1 operating position](include/img/narc-1-operating-position.jpeg)

### Equipment summary

- Icom IC-7610 (HF + 6m) transceiver
    - Astron RS-35A power supply
- Icom SM-50 desk mic
- Clipper PTT footswitch
- Heil Pro-7 headset
- Nifty mini-manual and other manuals
  - Check the right side of the operating position and the drawer under the radio.

- Dell PC, dual monitor set-up

- Elecraft [KPA1500](KPA1500.qmd) amplifier
  - Elecraft power supply
  
### Connection scheme

```{mermaid}
flowchart TD
  A[IC-7610] ---|Coax-Ant1|B[KPA-1500 Ant 1]
  A ---|RCA ALC|B
  A ---|RCA Send|B
  A --> M(Morse Paddles)
  A --> N(Clipper footswitch)
  A ---|USB|C[NARC1 PC]
  C ---|USB|F(Keyboard)
  C ---|Bluetooth|G(Mouse)
  C ---|HDMI|H(Monitor)
  C ---|CAT 6|L(Network Switch)
  J ---|AC Power| C
  E ---|120V AC|I(Kasa Switch)
  I ---|AC Power|J(Surge Protector)
  I ---|Wifi|K(NARC wifi)
  A ---|Power Cable|E(Astron RS-35A)
  B ---|Coax Ant1|D(Antenna Connectors)
  H ---|AC Power|J
```
 
### Software summary

- Windows 10
- Digital modes
  - WSTJ-X 2.5.4
  - JTAlert 2.50.0
  - JS8Call 2.2.2
  - [fldigi suite](fldigi-IC-7610.qmd)
  - Winlink Express 1.7.11.0
      - VARA HF 4.7.7 (registered to W3YA)
  - VarAC 6.6.13
  - Yoniq (SSTV)
- Remote control
  - Win4Icom
- Logging
  - N1MM
  - Amateur Contact Log (ACLog) 7.0.9 by N3FJP (registered to W3YA)
